us.phonetic: /adj., n. koʊˈɔrdənɪt, -ˌneɪt; v. koʊˈɔrdəˌneɪt/, (adj., n. kō ôr′dn it, -dn āt′; v. kō ôr′dn āt′)

example.eg: Marnie and Stella coordinated the company picnic.
example.egtrans: 玛尼和史黛拉负责协调组织公司野餐活动。

example.eg: Mrs. Jones wants to coordinate the curtains with the furniture.
example.egtrans: 琼斯夫人希望使窗帘和家具搭配起来。

example.eg: The colours in the meeting room coordinate well.
The color palette chosen for this room coordinates well with the architecture.
example.egtrans: 这个房间所选用的色彩组合与建筑很协调。

example.eg: I coordinated with Mr. Smith's secretary to arrange a business lunch.
example.egtrans: 我与史密斯先生的秘书配合，安排一次商务餐。

example.eg: It's simple to use a GPS to discover your coordinates.
example.egtrans: 使用全球定位系统可以轻松找到你的坐标。
